```{r setup}
library(SSDRnaSeq)
library(ADAPTS)
```


```{r}
data(LM22)
head(LM22)
```


```{r}
bulk <- SSDRnaSeq::GSE107011$gene_expression
res <- SSDRnaSeq::SSDRnaSeq(reference = LM22, bulk = bulk, k_folds = 2, nIteration = 2,  methodDeconv = "DCQ")
```
